title: Restyle joke site to early-2010s YouTube look with pink palette, animated creme heading, and photo banner

requirements.text: Update the homepage layout and styling to mimic an early-2010s YouTube UI (nostalgic video-site feel) while keeping the site as a single-page joke experience.

quotes: Can you orient the ui to mimic that of early 2010’s YouTube

acceptanceCriteria: The top-of-page header/navigation area visually resembles early-2010s YouTube (e.g., boxed/strip header, compact controls, and overall nostalgic spacing/typography), without changing the app into a multi-page site.
The existing joke interaction (show punchline / next joke) remains functional and prominent on the page.

requirements.text: Add a cropped top banner image using a real-looking 2010s-era stock photo of an excited mom giving a thumbs up, and render it at the top of the page as a banner.

quotes: an real stock image of an excited mom giving a thumbs up, from around the same decade as the 2010’s, is cropped as the banner on the top of the page.

acceptanceCriteria: A new static image asset exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used as a full-width top banner.
The banner is visually cropped to a wide aspect ratio (banner-style) and sits at the top of the page above the main content.
The page loads without broken image links.

requirements.text: Change the main site heading styling so it is creme-colored and has a slow gloss/sheen animation that loops indefinitely.

quotes: Heading is in a creme color and is has a slow gloss animation that plays indefinitely.

acceptanceCriteria: The prominent on-page heading text remains exactly "your_mom's_website" and is rendered in a creme color.
A visible gloss/sheen effect animates across the heading continuously (indefinite loop) at a slow speed.
The animation does not block interaction and does not cause layout shift.

requirements.text: Update the global color theme to: lighter, vibrant pink page background; darker pink for foreground UI surfaces; white for most text; with an explicit exception that the footer's joke manufacturing text "moms_of_ momland.inc" and the joke copyright notes at the bottom of the page are not white.

quotes: The background is lighter, more vibrant pink, the foreground ui is a darker pink, and any text is in white. (except for joke manufacturing “moms_of_ momland.inc” and joke copyright notes at the bottom of the page.)

acceptanceCriteria: Global background reads as a lighter, vibrant pink; primary UI surfaces (cards/containers/header surfaces) read as a darker pink.
Default text across the page renders as white on the pink UI.
The footer area includes "moms_of_ momland.inc" and joke copyright notes, and those specific texts are not white (but remain readable and consistent with the design).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the application as a single-page joke website named exactly "your_mom's_website" (visible heading text), and keep existing joke interaction working.
nonGoals: No new authentication providers or third-party integrations.
No conversion to a multi-page video site or actual video upload/playback features.

required: Wide cropped stock-photo-style banner of an excited mom giving a thumbs up, 2010s-era look (excited-mom-thumbs-up-banner.dim_1600x400.png)
